name: New Wave
description:
A platformer where you create your own platforms and play as a cute little fox trying to escape the neon city and make new friends along the way that can help you by-pass the obstacles that are thrown in-front of you.

If you could take some time to fill out this Feedback sheet it would be super helpful for us!
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc2RF4xbA9qeQQ4u4hfwON2NdYz113q9bA2GuzrlUVRV78GrQ/viewform

If you're interested in the music for the game here's the credits:
"Broken Reality", "Exit the Premises", "Furious Freak", "Ouroboros"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
